question: 感謝
sourceMnemonic: You have <kanji>feeling</kanji>s of <kanji>apologizing</kanji>. Strangely, this word means <vocabulary>thanks</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>gratitude</vocabulary>, though. Perhaps someone did something so nice for you that you want to apologize for how many nice things they're doing for you. You are this grateful to them!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
